'''Karim Walldén''' was the lead producer of brand experience at [[Mojang Studios]]. He joined the company in February 2017.

== About ==
Walldén's favorite games include Mario Kart 8 Deluxe on the Nintendo Switch, and Rollercoaster Tycoon.

He has a girlfriend, and a young son named Nico.
